dict.acceptation: 钢，钢铁；钢制品；兵器；钢铁工业；
钢制的；钢铁业的；坚强的；[色彩]青灰色的；

sent.orig: Select it from the Plugins Panel and see if anything about blue-steel appears.
sent.trans: 从插件面板上选出插件，看看关于blue-steel内容有没有出现。

sent.orig: Steel osteotomy for treatment of congenital dislocation of hip in children aged 6～9 years.
sent.trans: Steel三联截骨治疗6～9岁儿童先天性髋脱位。

sent.orig: State-controlled Wuhan Steel and Angang, among others, have already embarked on mergers and acquisition deals.
sent.trans: 国有控股的武汉钢铁Steel)和鞍钢(Angang)等公司已开始着手进行并购交易。

sent.orig: Steel products including semi-finished products, steel, flat steel, steel pipe.
sent.trans: 钢厂制品包括半成品、长钢、扁钢、钢管。
